description:
* Based on a light novel series of the same name by http://anidb.net/cr17862 [Fushimi Tsukasa], illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr17314 [Kanzaki Hiro].
http://anidb.net/ch17524 [Kousaka Kyousuke], a normal seventeen-year-old high school student, had not gotten along with his fourteen-year-old sister, http://anidb.net/ch17525 [Kirino], in years. For longer than he could remember, Kirino had ignored him entirely and even abused him. It seemed their relationship would continue that way forever.
However, one day he found out that Kirino was secretly addicted to anime, manga and visual novels, including adult games, and had a gigantic collection of them all. Having discovered her secret, he was forced into a long chain of events that included helping hide it all, but would lead him to help her learn to deal with her hobby in a better way, including eventually finding real-life friends with similar tastes, and with whom he, too, would get acquainted. Several months passed.
The time spent so far may be fairly long time for their ages, but still little has changed. Kirino is still less than nice to her brother, her inability to deal with her hobby properly has not quite subsided, and she is still very passionate about her favourite anime, Hoshikuzu Witch Meruru (Stardust Witch Meruru), and her adult games. While now Kyousuke has means of reaching some of her friends, a few of whom are also his friends, her behaviour still forces him into dealing with a lot of unexpected trouble. Meanwhile, it could be said that, among her friends, there are one or two who might be interested in being more than just friends with him... Or could it?
— written by Hinoe
Note: All three final episodes (14-16) were screened on August 9, 2013 on a high-definition screen with 1,700 seats at Otakon Fest.

REGULAR.description:
After Kirino is brought back from her study abroad in America by Kyousuke, she spends time getting back into her normal routine as she surrounds herself with Aragaki Ayase and other friends who are excited to see her back. In contrast to that, Kyousuke is feeling dissatisfied with the fact that Kirino is ignoring him like she used to before their last year together. So Kirino responds by...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ma petite sœur n`est pas censée revenir
My Little Sister Can`t Come Back Home Again
Ore no Imouto ga Futatabi Kaettekuru Wake ga Nai
俺の妹が再び帰ってくるわけがない

REGULAR.description:
When Kirino gets hooked on a portable bishoujo game and starts ignoring her friends, Aragaki Ayase asks Kyousuke for help in breaking her addiction. To help her out, Kyousuke talks to Kirino and persuades her to cut back on the game, but ends up borrowing it from her instead. Then, when Kyousuke tries playing it...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je n`en reviens pas que son frère me persécute à cause d`un jeu de drague
Shinjite Okuridashita Onii-san ga Keitai Bishoujo Game ni Dohamari Shite Sekuhara Shite Kuru You ni Naru Wake ga Nai
The Onii-san I Trusted and Sent Off Can`t Get This Addicted to a Mobile Dating Sim and Commit Sexual Harassment
信じて送り出したお兄さんが携帯美少女ゲームにドハマリしてセクハラしてくるようになるわけがない

REGULAR.description:
Kirino, Kyousuke, and Kuroneko visit Saori`s apartment to try and surprise her, but the two girls start reproaching Kyousuke when he realizes he doesn`t know her room number. As the three of them stand there arguing, an elegant young woman appears before them. The moment she realizes it`s Kyousuke and the others, she covers her face and crouches down, crying out with a voice they all recognized.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mon amie n`est pas censée enlever ses lunettes
My Friend Can`t Take Off Her Glasses
Ore no Tomodachi ga Megame o Hazusu Wake ga Nai
俺の友達が眼鏡を外すわけがない

REGULAR.description:
When Kyousuke comes home from school and opens his door, he finds a young, naked girl who just got out of the bath. Kyousuke is completely shocked, but the young girl is Ria, Kirino`s roommate from when she studied abroad. She`s staying with the Kousaka family while she`s in Japan, but the innocent young girl asks Kirino and Kyousuke to take her sightseeing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La rivale de ma petite sœur n`est pas censée venir au Japon
My Little Sister`s Rival Can`t Come to Japan
Ore no Imouto no Rival ga Rainichi Suru Wake ga Nai
俺の妹のライバルが来日するわけがない

REGULAR.description:
Kirino confesses that she wants Kyousuke to be her boyfriend, and he`s confused. She had her reasons, though. Once Kyousuke hears why Kirino asked that, he goes on a date with her as her boyfriend, but Manami and the others see them while they`re on their date.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can`t Be My Little Sister`s Boyfriend and My Little Sister Can`t Have a Boyfriend
Je ne suis pas censé être le petit ami de ma petite sœur, et elle n`est pas censée en avoir un
Ore ga Imouto no Kareshi na Wake ga Naishi, Ore no Imouto ni Kareshi ga Iru Wake ga Nai
俺が妹の彼氏なわけがないし, 俺の妹に彼氏がいるわけがない

REGULAR.description:
While attending comiket, the group coincidentally happens on a young man, Mikagami, who turns out to be a fashion model and designer that Kirino knew from work. As the two of them start enjoying a friendly otaku conversation, Kyousuke finds himself wondering about their relationship. Then Kirino comes forth and confesses the shocking truth to him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ma petite sœur n`est pas censée amener son petit ami à la maison
Ore no Imouto ga Ie ni Kareshi o Tsuretekuru Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Sister Would Bring Her Boyfriend Home!
俺の妹が家に彼氏をつれてくるわけがない

REGULAR.description:
Kyousuke decides not to answer Kuroneko`s confession and asks her for a day to think it over. As Kirino and Manami give him their support, he ends up spending a day with her trying to organize how he feels. On their way home from the comiket after-party together with everyone else, Kyousuke finally gives Kuroneko his answer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can`t Become a Couple with My Underclassman
Je ne suis pas censé sortir avec ma disciple
Ore ga Kouhai to Koibito Doushi ni Naru Wake ga Nai
俺が後輩と恋人同士になるわけがない

REGULAR.description:
Now that he`s going out with Kuroneko, Kyousuke is really excited. Kuroneko fels the same too. Although neither are used to dating and both are a bit hesitant, they still enjoy their time spent going out together. During their date, Kuroneko pulls out her notebook, but what`s written on that page...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can`t Create a Summer Memory with My Underclassman
Je ne suis pas censé me faire des souvenirs d`été avec ma disciple
Ore ga Kouhai to Hitonatsu no Omoide o Tsukuru Wake ga Nai
俺が後輩とひと夏の思い出を作るわけがない

REGULAR.description:
After going to the fireworks display with Kuroneko, Kyousuke can no longer get a hold of her. He can`t get his mind off the line she showed him in her notebook, and when he goes to school he suddenly learns that Kuroneko transferred away without telling him. Unable to accept the truth and hanging his head in despair, Kyousuke turns to Kirino for advice that night...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ma petite sœur ne peut pas être aussi mignonne
My Little Sister Can`t Be This Cute!
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai!
俺の妹がこんなに可愛いわけがない!

REGULAR.description:
Once Ayase learned that Kyousuke was dating Kuroneko, she called him to her room and interrogated him. Several days later, she receives word from Manami that Kyousuke and Kuroneko broke up. Ayase believes it`s all her fault, so she calls Kyousuke...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ma petite sœur n`est pas censée porter une robe de mariée
My Little Sister Can`t Wear a Wedding Dress
Ore no Imouto ga Wedding Dress o Kiru Wake ga Nai
俺の妹がウェディングドレスを着るわけがない

REGULAR.description:
The Kousaka household holds a family meeting. Their mother, Yoshino, has grown suspicious of how Kirino and Kyousuke have grown too close lately. The two of them desperately try to smooth over the situation, but their father, Daisuke, orders Kyousuke to leave the house and focus on his studies until he can earn an A on his mock exam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitorigurashi no Aniki no Heya ni Imouto-tachi ga Oshikakeru Wake ga Nai
Little Sisters Can`t Barge in on Their Brother Who Lives Alone
Ma petite sœur et ses copines ne sont pas censées se ruer chez le grand frère qui habite seul
一人暮らしの兄貴の部屋に妹たちが押しかけるわけがない

REGULAR.description:
At Manami`s suggestion, everyone is invited to Kyousuke`s new apartment for a moving-in party. All of Kyousuke`s usual friends are gathering at his new place on the day of the party when Kirino arrives and she`s forced to confront Manami...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`ange Ayase n`est pas censée descendre dans le studio où je vis seul
Maji Tenshisugiru Ayase-tan ga Hitorigurashi no Orenchi ni Kourin Suru Wake ga Nai
Total Angel Ayase-tan Can`t Descend Upon My Place While I Live Alone
マジ天使すぎるあやせたんが一人暮らしの俺んちに降臨するわけがない

REGULAR.description:
Going back 8 years ago... When Kyousuke comes home, Kirino comes running to him in tears. When she holds out a broken doll between her hands, Kyousuke gives her a confident smile and starts fixing the doll. Kirino watches with anxiety, but he easily fixes it. That was the Kyousuke that Kirino used to admire...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atashi ga Aitsu ni Koi nante Suru Wake Nai
Je ne suis pas censée être amoureuse de lui
Little Sisters Can`t Fall in Love with Their Older Brothers!
